privacy.title: Privacy & Cookies
privacy.headline: Your data, your control.
privacy.intro: We process only what is needed to provide the service. You can reject analytics cookies at any time from the banner.

data.title: What we store
data.body: Account data via Supabase Auth, uploaded documents in Supabase Storage, embeddings in pgvector, conversations and SOPs in Postgres. Access is scoped by organization (RLS).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: Strictly necessary cookies for auth/session. Analytics cookies are disabled until you accept them in the banner.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: You can request access, rectification, deletion, restriction, objection to processing, and data portability. You can also withdraw consent for analytics cookies at any time from the banner. For organization data, contact your admin.
